mapper.sql: GMId, Year, Place, UpLi, LoLi, Gdp
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_gdpmiddletable where year = #{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_gdpmiddletable (GMId, Year, Place, UpLi, LoLi, Gdp) values (#{gmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upli,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{loli,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

GMId,
